    ESR 04 :: List of Publications

    1. Ahsan, M., Marton, F., Pintus, R., and Gobbetti, E. 2022. Audio-visual annotation graphs for guiding lens-based scene exploration. Computers & Graphics.
      • DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cag.2022.05.003
      • URL
    2. Jaspe-Villanueva, A., Ahsan, M., Pintus, R., Giachetti, A., Marton, F., and Gobbetti, E. 2021. Web-Based Exploration of Annotated Multi-Layered Relightable Image Models. J. Comput. Cult. Herit. 14, 2.
      • DOI: 10.1145/3430846
      • URL
    3. Bettio, F., Ahsan, M., Marton, F., and Gobbetti, E. 2021. A Novel Approach for Exploring Annotated Data With Interactive Lenses. Computer Graphics Forum.
      • DOI: 10.1111/cgf.14315
      • URL
    4. Ahsan, M., Marton, F., Pintus, R., and Gobbetti, E. 2021. Guiding Lens-based Exploration using Annotation Graphs. Smart Tools and Apps for Graphics - Eurographics Italian Chapter Conference, The Eurographics Association.
      • DOI: 10.2312/stag.20211477
      • URL
    5. Pintus, R., Ahsan, M., Marton, F., and Gobbetti, E. 2021. Exploiting Neighboring Pixels Similarity for Effective SV-BRDF Reconstruction from Sparse MLICs. Eurographics Workshop on Graphics and Cultural Heritage, The Eurographics Association.
      • DOI: 10.2312/gch.20211412
      • URL
